sentences.en: a TV and integral video recorder
Anxiety is integral to the human condition.
sentences.cn: 焦虑是人类的基本生存状况之一。

sentences.en: Her flexuous and stealthy figure became an integral part of the scene.
sentences.cn: 她那袅袅婷婷、潜潜等等的娇软腰肢,和那片景物融为一体.

sentences.en: I'm specializing in differential and integral calculus.
sentences.cn: 我正专攻微分学和积分学.

sentences.en: It was an integral part of the political sorting out.
sentences.cn: 它是政治分野的不可分割的一部分.

sentences.en: Lustre is the integral effect of reflection and diffraction.
sentences.cn: 色泽是反射和衍射的综合效果.

sentences.en: Music is an integral part of the school's curriculum.
sentences.cn: 音乐是这所学校的课程中基本的一环。

sentences.en: Rituals, celebrations, and festivals form an integral part of every human society.
sentences.cn: 仪式、庆典和节日是每个人类社会不可缺少的组成部分。

sentences.en: She is our best player, and is integral to our team.
sentences.cn: 她是我们最好的球员, 我们队离不开她.

sentences.en: The arms and legs are integral parts of a human body.
sentences.cn: 臂和腿是人体不可缺少的部分.

sentences.en: The indefinite integral is an antiderivative.
The resonance integral is often called an exchange integral.
sentences.cn: 共振积分常常叫做交换积分.

sentences.en: The ring C is called the integral closure of A in B.
There is actually a failure of the integral particle of the catalyst.
sentences.cn: 实际上存在有整粒催化剂的破碎.

sentences.en: Ultrastructural investigations have become an integral part of cell biology and pathology.
sentences.cn: 超微结构的研究已成为细胞生物学和病理学的主要部分.

sentences.en: Vegetables are an integral part of our diet.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜是我们膳食中不可缺少的一部分。

sentences.en: We can use the additive property of the integral.
sentences.cn: 我们可利用积分的可加性.

sentences.en: What is both the integral and concrete object of linguistics?
sentences.cn: 语言学的又完整又具体的对象是什么 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 综合的；完整的；互相协调的
[数] 整数；整体；完整的事物
[自] 积分器；[电子] 积分电路；整合之人
整合；使…成整体（integrate的过去分词）
求积分；取消隔离；成为一体
使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和

phrases.tran_cn: 积分控制；整体控制；积分动棕制
积分部分；整数部份；主要的部分

trans.tran_en: Something that is an integral part of something is an essential part of that thing
